channel.title: Threat Intelligence on Floyd Hightower
channel.description: Recent content in Threat Intelligence on Floyd Hightower

item.title: Fake Apple App Download Sites
item.description: Note: All URLs/domains in this post are defanged. You can fang/defang them here. I was investigating how to use x11 to serve a GUI running inside a docker container for an nand2tetris project I’m working on and I found a collection of domains serving fake Apple app downloads: hXXps://loadsea[.]heredoggi[.]com/x11-forwarding-for-mac/ hXXps://moraea[.]batteryscience[.]us/location-of-x11-libraries-mac-os/ hXXps://letdwnl[.]brittanythomassigler[.]us/mac-os-x11-app/ hXXps://gogo[.]sunshinebeagles[.]us/mac-x11-manual-pdf-5252/ hXXps://isabelmaries[.]co/xquartz-alternative/ hXXps://holidayshunter[.]naturalwatches[.]co/x11-forwarding-for-mac/ Most of these redirect to a URL like: hXXps://viperctum[.]info/go[.]php?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn[.]ketamo[.]info%2F%3Fa%3D337 89%26c%3D303745%26s1%3D111%26s2%3D1411c3vzwslb4a16%26s3%3DX11%2BForwarding%2BFor%2BM ac&uclick=3vzwslb4 Which, decoded, looks like: hXXps://viperctum[.]info/go[.]php?url=hXXps://cdn[.]ketamo[.]info/?a=33789&c=303745 &s1=111&s2=1411c3vzwslb4a16&s3=X11+Forwarding+For+Mac&uclick=3vzwslb4 When followed, this link goes to:

item.title: Conjecture on Resource Utilization
item.description: We fifty-four were the masters of England! Twenty-five thousand men lay dead around us. But how treacherous is fortune! In a little while - say an hour - happened a thing, by my own fault, which - but I have no heart to write that. Let the record end here.1 1 - Written by "The Boss" (from A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court) We were in a trap, you see - a trap of our own making… we had conquered; in turn we were conquered.

item.title: Analysis of Obfuscated PHP Malware
item.description: Updated on February 27, 2019. I am monitoring the php decoder site here and was alerted when the decoded php here had a String.fromCharCode command in it. After decoding the character code (104, 116, 116, 112, 115, 58, 47, 47, 103, 101, 116, 109, 121, 99, 111, 110, 102, 105, 103, 112, 108, 101, 97, 115, 101, 46, 99, 111, 109, 47, 103, 101, 116, 46, 112, 104, 112)1 --, this produced https://getmyconfigplease[.

item.title: Playbook Friday Blogs
item.description: The following playbooks have been featured in a ThreatConnect “Playbook Friday” blog post: https://threatconnect.com/blog/google-alerts-rss-reader/ https://threatconnect.com/blog/robtex-asn-query-ip-query/ https://threatconnect.com/blog/task-management/
